channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Goddess Mazu Travels to Japan for Taiwan Culture Festival
item.description: A statue of the sea goddess Mazu, worshiped widely in Taiwan, has made a special appearance at a Taiwanese culture festival in Kyoto, Japan.

item.title: Taiwan Lawmakers Tussle Over Controversial Reforms
item.description: Taiwan's legislature has descended into chaos as lawmakers came to physical blows over controversial political reforms.

item.title: LGBTQ+ Support Up in Taiwan After 5 Years of Same-Sex Marriage
item.description: On the week of the fifth anniversary of Taiwan legalizing same-sex marriage, the Taiwan Equality Campaign has published the results of a survey that shows increasing support for LG

item.title: Taipei Mayor Talks Disaster Preparedness at Global Mayors' Forum
item.description: Taipei Mayor Chiang Wan-an has been sharing his city's experience in disaster preparedness at a forum with mayors from cities in over 40 countries.
